typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TrackID as string,
		TrackName as string,
		Duration as string,
		Album as string,
		TrackURL as string,
		TrackPath as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		AlbumID as string,
		AlbumName as string,
		ReleaseDate as string,
		Price as string,
		Artist as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		ArtistID as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Town as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source1, source2 join(Album == AlbumID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		TrackID,
		TrackName,
		Duration,
		Album,
		TrackURL,
		TrackPath,
		AlbumName,
		ReleaseDate,
		Price,
		Artist
	)) ~> sink1
